archimate:Requirement.name: SY.2.3.5: Backup arrangements should enable operating systems, application software, system software associated with technical infrastructure (e.g. endpoint devices, virtual systems, network equipment and critical infrastructure) and information to be restored within a critical timescale by using:
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
